name: Multiply
description:
Quickly multiply a layer in rows, columns or both (grid)


Features

  • Select amount of rows and columns
  • Select row and column gap (negative gap allowed)
  • After multiplication all new layers get selected so you can immediately make changes with "Smart Selection"
  • Supported in both Figma and FigJam



Notes

  • To avoid memory issues / freezing files, this plugin limits to maximum 2000 duplications or 10000 new (sub)layers
